attributes.action: Prevent the extension of civil partnership laws to cover opposite sex couples
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BBC news reported recently that the Law Commission had raised the issue of co-habiting couples of opposite sex should have more protection if they split up.

This is an erosion of the meaning of marriage and in complete contrast to a Christian based society such as ours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
